title: Investing for Beginners
description: What is a GIC and why is it popular for newcomers?

content.title: The GIC Guarantee
content.text: A Guaranteed Investment Certificate (GIC) is a safe investment where your original 'principal' is 100% protected. You agree to leave your money for a set time (e.g., 1 year) in exchange for a guaranteed interest rate.

quiz.question: What is the main advantage of a GIC?
options: You can withdraw it every day
quiz.explanation: GICs are popular because you are guaranteed to get your original money back plus interest.
